messages.subject: was: Early Bird registration- Now: Conferences
messages.msgSnippet: I have been to the homeschooling one in Orlando.  I actaully should have know at that instant I was going to unschool.  We left by the middle of the first day
messages.messageBody:
I have been to the homeschooling one in Orlando. I actaully should have know at that instant I was going to unschool. We left by the middle of the first day and went for wings, beer, and go carts. LOL.
Melissa


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Faith Void <littlemsvoid@...> wrote:
>
> Melissa,
>
> Many people travel to go to conferences. I have traveled to Ohio,
> Mass., Tennesee, north & south Carolina just to hang with other
> unschoolers :-) for what it's worth we our youngest is not yet two and
> we have a very low income. But we find ways! Our family makes these
> conferences and visits priority as it is amazing to be with other
> unschoolers. It has made all the difference in the world for us.
>
> Faith
>
> Sent from my iPhone

messages.subject: Re: Fwd: Early Bird registration is now open for Enjoy Life Unschooling Conferen
messages.msgSnippet: There was someone mentioning pulling together an unschooling convention in FL. A few months back, I think. Anyone else remember that? Nance
messages.messageBody:
There was someone mentioning pulling together an unschooling convention in FL. A few months back, I think. Anyone else remember that?

Nance

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Fwd: Early Bird registration is now open for Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Melissa, Many people travel to go to conferences. I have traveled to Ohio, Mass., Tennesee, north & south Carolina just to hang with other unschoolers :-) for
messages.messageBody:
Melissa,

Many people travel to go to conferences. I have traveled to Ohio,
Mass., Tennesee, north & south Carolina just to hang with other
unschoolers :-) for what it's worth we our youngest is not yet two and
we have a very low income. But we find ways! Our family makes these
conferences and visits priority as it is amazing to be with other
unschoolers. It has made all the difference in the world for us.

Faith

Sent from my iPhone

homeschool conventions, yeah,; unschooling convention, no.
kathy

 



________________________________
From: Melissa <ckent001@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 8, 2009 8:25:58 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Fwd: Early Bird registration is now open for Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference





That sounds like so much fun. I want to go to my first convention so bad. Does anyone know of any conventions in Florida-ever?
Melissa

messages.subject: Fwd: Early Bird registration is now open for Enjoy Life Unschooling  Conference
messages.msgSnippet: If you just can t get enough of unschoolers!  ~Kelly Kelly Lovejoy There is no single effort more radical in its potential for saving the world than a
messages.messageBody:
If you just can't get enough of unschoolers!


 ~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
"There is no single effort more radical in its potential for saving the world than a transformation of the way we raise our children." Marianne Williamson


-----Original Message-----
From: Faith Void <littlemsvoid@...>


















REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN!!!














Enjoy Life Unschooling

Conference

21-22 September 2009
in Frederick, MD
at the beautiful Mar Lu Conference Center

Speakers include:

Danielle Conger









Kelly Lovejoy
Elissa Cleaveland
Heather Burditt
Zoa Connor









and
TJ Phillips leading the SSUDs

Funshops galore!
Hula hopping and hula hoop making
Button making
Video games
Bananagrams tournament









henna
gymnastics
black velvet art

ATC trading card making


can you think of more? Host a funshop!!!

We will also have a campfire with music, story telling and s'mores :-)










AND

An open mic coffee house live and recorded music, board games, crafts, your special talent to share, coffee, tea, soda and more!!!











join our yahoo group
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EnjoyLifeUnschooling/

we are on twitter
http://twitter.com/NjoyLifeUnskuln










and facebook
http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1161919423&ref=profile#/group.php?gid=109548068495









join us!!!
www.enjoylifeunschooling.com




































[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
